name: Punch Blockz Prototype
description:
PUNCH BLOCKZ

Punch Blockz is a game where you are a block and you punch multiple blocks. Prototype project for MSU MI-455 Gamedev course.

Attack to the left and right, and dodge up and down to avoid attacks. Dodging at the right time will parry an enemy, dealing extra damage and healing you.

Controls:

  • WASD
  • LShift RShift Space
  • Arrow Keys
  • X360 Face buttons
